definition[0]: an arrangement of numbers, letters, or signs in rows and columns that you consider to be one amount, and that you use in solving mathematical problems
definition[1]: a situation from which a person or society can grow and develop
definition[2]: a living part in which something is formed or develops, such as the substance from which your fingernails grow
definition[3]: a mould (=hollow container) into which melted metal, plastic etc is poured to form a shape
definition[4]: the rock in which hard stones or jewels have formed
